06285         var expr = parseRelationalExpression();
06286 
06287         while (match('==') || match('!=') || match('===') || match('!==')) {
06288             expr = {
06289                 type: Syntax.BinaryExpression,
06290                 operator: lex().value,
06291                 left: expr,
06292                 right: parseRelationalExpression()
06293             };
06294         }
06295 
06296         return expr;
06297     }
06298 
06299     // 11.10 Binary Bitwise Operators
06300 
06301     function parseBitwiseANDExpression() {
06302         var expr = parseEqualityExpression();
06303 
06304         while (match('&')) {
06305             lex();
06306             expr = {
06307                 type: Syntax.BinaryExpression,
06308                 operator: '&',
06309                 left: expr,
06310                 right: parseEqualityExpression()
06311             };
06312         }
06313 
06314         return expr;
06315     }
06316 
06317     function parseBitwiseXORExpression() {
06318         var expr = parseBitwiseANDExpression();
06319 
06320         while (match('^')) {
06321             lex();
06322             expr = {
06323                 type: Syntax.BinaryExpression,
06324                 operator: '^',
06325                 left: expr,
06326                 right: parseBitwiseANDExpression()
06327             };
06328         }
06329 
06330         return expr;
06331     }
06332 
06333     function parseBitwiseORExpression() {
06334         var expr = parseBitwiseXORExpression();
06335 
06336         while (match('|')) {
06337             lex();
06338             expr = {
06339                 type: Syntax.BinaryExpression,
06340                 operator: '|',
06341                 left: expr,
06342                 right: parseBitwiseXORExpression()
06343             };
06344         }
06345 
06346         return expr;
06347     }
06348 
06349     // 11.11 Binary Logical Operators
06350 
06351     function parseLogicalANDExpression() {
06352         var expr = parseBitwiseORExpression();
06353 
06354         while (match('&&')) {
06355             lex();
06356             expr = {
06357                 type: Syntax.LogicalExpression,
06358                 operator: '&&',
06359                 left: expr,
06360                 right: parseBitwiseORExpression()
06361             };
06362         }
06363 
06364         return expr;
06365     }
06366 
06367     function parseLogicalORExpression() {
06368         var expr = parseLogicalANDExpression();
06369 
06370         while (match('||')) {
06371             lex();
06372             expr = {
06373                 type: Syntax.LogicalExpression,
06374                 operator: '||',
06375                 left: expr,
06376                 right: parseLogicalANDExpression()
06377             };
06378         }
06379 
06380         return expr;
06381     }
06382 
06383     // 11.12 Conditional Operator
06384 
06385     function parseConditionalExpression() {
06386         var expr, previousAllowIn, consequent;
06387 
06388         expr = parseLogicalORExpression();
06389 
06390         if (match('?')) {
06391             lex();
06392             previousAllowIn = state.allowIn;
06393             state.allowIn = true;
06394             consequent = parseAssignmentExpression();
06395             state.allowIn = previousAllowIn;
06396             expect(':');
06397 
06398             expr = {
06399                 type: Syntax.ConditionalExpression,
06400                 test: expr,
06401                 consequent: consequent,
06402                 alternate: parseAssignmentExpression()
06403             };
06404         }
06405 
06406         return expr;
06407     }
06408 
06409     // 11.13 Assignment Operators
06410 
06411     function parseAssignmentExpression() {
06412         var token, expr;
06413 
06414         token = lookahead();
06415         expr = parseConditionalExpression();
06416 
06417         if (matchAssign()) {
06418             // LeftHandSideExpression
06419             if (!isLeftHandSide(expr)) {
06420                 throwError({}, Messages.InvalidLHSInAssignment);
06421             }
06422 
06423             // 11.13.1
06424             if (strict && expr.type === Syntax.Identifier && isRestrictedWord(expr.name)) {
06425                 throwErrorTolerant(token, Messages.StrictLHSAssignment);
06426             }
06427 
06428             expr = {
06429                 type: Syntax.AssignmentExpression,
06430                 operator: lex().value,
06431                 left: expr,
06432                 right: parseAssignmentExpression()
06433             };
06434         }
06435 
06436         return expr;
06437     }
06438 
06439     // 11.14 Comma Operator
06440 
06441     function parseExpression() {
06442         var expr = parseAssignmentExpression();
06443 
06444         if (match(',')) {
06445             expr = {
06446                 type: Syntax.SequenceExpression,
06447                 expressions: [ expr ]
06448             };
06449 
06450             while (index < length) {
06451                 if (!match(',')) {
06452                     break;
06453                 }
06454                 lex();
06455                 expr.expressions.push(parseAssignmentExpression());
06456             }
06457 
06458         }
06459         return expr;
06460     }
06461 
06462     // 12.1 Block
06463 
06464     function parseStatementList() {
06465         var list = [],
06466             statement;
06467 
06468         while (index < length) {
06469             if (match('}')) {
06470                 break;
06471             }
06472             statement = parseSourceElement();
06473             if (typeof statement === 'undefined') {
06474                 break;
06475             }
06476             list.push(statement);
06477         }
06478 
06479         return list;
06480     }
06481 
06482     function parseBlock() {
06483         var block;
06484 
06485         expect('{');
06486 
06487         block = parseStatementList();
06488 
06489         expect('}');
06490 
06491         return {
06492             type: Syntax.BlockStatement,
06493             body: block
06494         };
06495     }
06496 
06497     // 12.2 Variable Statement
06498 
06499     function parseVariableIdentifier() {
06500         var token = lex();
06501 
06502         if (token.type !== Token.Identifier) {
06503             throwUnexpected(token);
06504         }
06505 
06506         return {
06507             type: Syntax.Identifier,
06508             name: token.value
06509         };
06510     }
06511 
06512     function parseVariableDeclaration(kind) {
06513         var id = parseVariableIdentifier(),
06514             init = null;
06515 
06516         // 12.2.1
06517         if (strict && isRestrictedWord(id.name)) {
06518             throwErrorTolerant({}, Messages.StrictVarName);
06519         }
06520 
06521         if (kind === 'const') {
06522             expect('=');
06523             init = parseAssignmentExpression();
06524         } else if (match('=')) {
06525             lex();
06526             init = parseAssignmentExpression();
06527         }
06528 
06529         return {
06530             type: Syntax.VariableDeclarator,
06531             id: id,
06532             init: init
06533         };
06534     }
06535 
06536     function parseVariableDeclarationList(kind) {
06537         var list = [];
06538 
06539         do {
06540             list.push(parseVariableDeclaration(kind));
06541             if (!match(',')) {
06542                 break;
06543             }
06544             lex();
06545         } while (index < length);
06546 
06547         return list;
06548     }
06549 
06550     function parseVariableStatement() {
06551         var declarations;
06552 
06553         expectKeyword('var');
06554 
06555         declarations = parseVariableDeclarationList();
06556 
06557         consumeSemicolon();
06558 
06559         return {
06560             type: Syntax.VariableDeclaration,
06561             declarations: declarations,
06562             kind: 'var'
06563         };
06564     }
06565 
06566     // kind may be `const` or `let`
06567     // Both are experimental and not in the specification yet.
06568     // see http://wiki.ecmascript.org/doku.php?id=harmony:const
06569     // and http://wiki.ecmascript.org/doku.php?id=harmony:let
06570     function parseConstLetDeclaration(kind) {
06571         var declarations;
06572 
06573         expectKeyword(kind);
06574 
06575         declarations = parseVariableDeclarationList(kind);
06576 
06577         consumeSemicolon();
06578 
06579         return {
06580             type: Syntax.VariableDeclaration,
06581             declarations: declarations,
06582             kind: kind
06583         };
06584     }
06585 
06586     // 12.3 Empty Statement
06587 
06588     function parseEmptyStatement() {
06589         expect(';');
06590 
06591         return {
06592             type: Syntax.EmptyStatement
06593         };
06594     }
06595 
06596     // 12.4 Expression Statement
06597 
06598     function parseExpressionStatement() {
06599         var expr = parseExpression();
06600 
06601         consumeSemicolon();
06602 
06603         return {
06604             type: Syntax.ExpressionStatement,
06605             expression: expr
06606         };
06607     }
06608 
06609     // 12.5 If statement
06610 
06611     function parseIfStatement() {
06612         var test, consequent, alternate;
06613 
06614         expectKeyword('if');
06615 
06616         expect('(');
06617 
06618         test = parseExpression();
06619 
06620         expect(')');
06621 
06622         consequent = parseStatement();
06623 
06624         if (matchKeyword('else')) {
06625             lex();
06626             alternate = parseStatement();
06627         } else {
06628             alternate = null;
06629         }
06630 
06631         return {
06632             type: Syntax.IfStatement,
06633             test: test,
06634             consequent: consequent,
06635             alternate: alternate
06636         };
06637     }
06638 
06639     // 12.6 Iteration Statements
06640 
06641     function parseDoWhileStatement() {
06642         var body, test, oldInIteration;
06643 
06644         expectKeyword('do');
06645 
06646         oldInIteration = state.inIteration;
06647         state.inIteration = true;
06648 
06649         body = parseStatement();
06650 
06651         state.inIteration = oldInIteration;
06652 
06653         expectKeyword('while');
06654 
06655         expect('(');
06656 
06657         test = parseExpression();
06658 
06659         expect(')');
06660 
06661         if (match(';')) {
06662             lex();
06663         }
06664 
06665         return {
06666             type: Syntax.DoWhileStatement,
06667             body: body,
06668             test: test
06669         };
06670     }
06671 
06672     function parseWhileStatement() {
06673         var test, body, oldInIteration;
06674 
06675         expectKeyword('while');
06676 
06677         expect('(');
06678 
06679         test = parseExpression();
06680 
06681         expect(')');
06682 
06683         oldInIteration = state.inIteration;
06684         state.inIteration = true;
06685 
06686         body = parseStatement();
06687 
06688         state.inIteration = oldInIteration;
06689 
06690         return {
06691             type: Syntax.WhileStatement,
06692             test: test,
06693             body: body
06694         };
06695     }
06696 
06697     function parseForVariableDeclaration() {
06698         var token = lex();
06699 
06700         return {
06701             type: Syntax.VariableDeclaration,
06702             declarations: parseVariableDeclarationList(),
06703             kind: token.value
06704         };
06705     }
06706 
06707     function parseForStatement() {
06708         var init, test, update, left, right, body, oldInIteration;
06709 
06710         init = test = update = null;
06711 
06712         expectKeyword('for');
06713 
06714         expect('(');
06715 
06716         if (match(';')) {
06717             lex();
06718         } else {
06719             if (matchKeyword('var') || matchKeyword('let')) {
06720                 state.allowIn = false;
06721                 init = parseForVariableDeclaration();
06722                 state.allowIn = true;
06723 
06724                 if (init.declarations.length === 1 && matchKeyword('in')) {
06725                     lex();
06726                     left = init;
06727                     right = parseExpression();
06728                     init = null;
06729                 }
06730             } else {
06731                 state.allowIn = false;
06732                 init = parseExpression();
06733                 state.allowIn = true;
06734 
06735                 if (matchKeyword('in')) {
06736                     // LeftHandSideExpression
06737                     if (!isLeftHandSide(init)) {
06738                         throwError({}, Messages.InvalidLHSInForIn);
06739                     }
06740 
06741                     lex();
06742                     left = init;
06743                     right = parseExpression();
06744                     init = null;
06745                 }
06746             }
06747 
06748             if (typeof left === 'undefined') {
06749                 expect(';');
06750             }
06751         }
06752 
06753         if (typeof left === 'undefined') {
06754 
06755             if (!match(';')) {
06756                 test = parseExpression();
06757             }
06758             expect(';');
06759 
06760             if (!match(')')) {
06761                 update = parseExpression();
06762             }
06763         }
06764 
06765         expect(')');
06766 
06767         oldInIteration = state.inIteration;
06768         state.inIteration = true;
06769 
06770         body = parseStatement();
06771 
06772         state.inIteration = oldInIteration;
06773 
06774         if (typeof left === 'undefined') {
06775             return {
06776                 type: Syntax.ForStatement,
06777                 init: init,
06778                 test: test,
06779                 update: update,
06780                 body: body
06781             };
06782         }
06783 
06784         return {
06785             type: Syntax.ForInStatement,
06786             left: left,
06787             right: right,
06788             body: body,
06789             each: false
06790         };
06791     }
06792 
06793     // 12.7 The continue statement
06794 
06795     function parseContinueStatement() {
06796         var token, label = null;
06797 
06798         expectKeyword('continue');
06799 
06800         // Optimize the most common form: 'continue;'.
06801         if (source[index] === ';') {
06802             lex();
06803 
06804             if (!state.inIteration) {
06805                 throwError({}, Messages.IllegalContinue);
06806             }
06807 
06808             return {
06809                 type: Syntax.ContinueStatement,
06810                 label: null
06811             };
06812         }
06813 
06814         if (peekLineTerminator()) {
06815             if (!state.inIteration) {
06816                 throwError({}, Messages.IllegalContinue);
06817             }
06818 
06819             return {
06820                 type: Syntax.ContinueStatement,
06821                 label: null
06822             };
06823         }
06824 
06825         token = lookahead();
06826         if (token.type === Token.Identifier) {
06827             label = parseVariableIdentifier();
06828 
06829             if (!Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(state.labelSet, label.name)) {
06830                 throwError({}, Messages.UnknownLabel, label.name);
06831             }
06832         }
06833 
06834         consumeSemicolon();
06835 
06836         if (label === null && !state.inIteration) {
06837             throwError({}, Messages.IllegalContinue);
06838         }
06839 
06840         return {
06841             type: Syntax.ContinueStatement,
06842             label: label
06843         };
06844     }
06845 
06846     // 12.8 The break statement
06847 
06848     function parseBreakStatement() {
06849         var token, label = null;
06850 
06851         expectKeyword('break');
06852 
06853         // Optimize the most common form: 'break;'.
06854         if (source[index] === ';') {
06855             lex();
06856 
06857             if (!(state.inIteration || state.inSwitch)) {
06858                 throwError({}, Messages.IllegalBreak);
06859             }
06860 
06861             return {
06862                 type: Syntax.BreakStatement,
06863                 label: null
06864             };
06865         }
06866 
06867         if (peekLineTerminator()) {
06868             if (!(state.inIteration || state.inSwitch)) {
06869                 throwError({}, Messages.IllegalBreak);
06870             }
06871 
06872             return {
06873                 type: Syntax.BreakStatement,
06874                 label: null
06875             };
06876         }
06877 
06878         token = lookahead();
06879         if (token.type === Token.Identifier) {
06880             label = parseVariableIdentifier();
06881 
06882             if (!Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(state.labelSet, label.name)) {
06883                 throwError({}, Messages.UnknownLabel, label.name);
06884             }
06885         }
06886 
06887         consumeSemicolon();
06888 
06889         if (label === null && !(state.inIteration || state.inSwitch)) {
06890             throwError({}, Messages.IllegalBreak);
06891         }
06892 
06893         return {
06894             type: Syntax.BreakStatement,
06895             label: label
06896         };
06897     }
06898 
06899     // 12.9 The return statement
06900 
06901     function parseReturnStatement() {
06902         var token, argument = null;
06903 
06904         expectKeyword('return');
06905 
06906         if (!state.inFunctionBody) {
06907             throwErrorTolerant({}, Messages.IllegalReturn);
06908         }
06909 
06910         // 'return' followed by a space and an identifier is very common.
06911         if (source[index] === ' ') {
06912             if (isIdentifierStart(source[index + 1])) {
06913                 argument = parseExpression();
06914                 consumeSemicolon();
06915                 return {
06916                     type: Syntax.ReturnStatement,
06917                     argument: argument
06918                 };
06919             }
06920         }
06921 
06922         if (peekLineTerminator()) {
06923             return {
06924                 type: Syntax.ReturnStatement,
06925                 argument: null
06926             };
06927         }
06928 
06929         if (!match(';')) {
06930             token = lookahead();
06931             if (!match('}') && token.type !== Token.EOF) {
06932                 argument = parseExpression();
06933             }
06934         }
06935 
06936         consumeSemicolon();
06937 
06938         return {
06939             type: Syntax.ReturnStatement,
06940             argument: argument
06941         };
06942     }
06943 
06944     // 12.10 The with statement
06945 
06946     function parseWithStatement() {
06947         var object, body;
06948 
06949         if (strict) {
06950             throwErrorTolerant({}, Messages.StrictModeWith);
06951         }
06952 
06953         expectKeyword('with');
06954 
06955         expect('(');
06956 
06957         object = parseExpression();
06958 
06959         expect(')');
06960 
06961         body = parseStatement();
06962 
06963         return {
06964             type: Syntax.WithStatement,
06965             object: object,
06966             body: body
06967         };
06968     }
06969 
06970     // 12.10 The swith statement
06971 
06972     function parseSwitchCase() {
06973         var test,
06974             consequent = [],
06975             statement;
06976 
06977         if (matchKeyword('default')) {
06978             lex();
06979             test = null;
06980         } else {
06981             expectKeyword('case');
06982             test = parseExpression();
06983         }
06984         expect(':');
06985 
06986         while (index < length) {
06987             if (match('}') || matchKeyword('default') || matchKeyword('case')) {
06988                 break;
06989             }
06990             statement = parseStatement();
06991             if (typeof statement === 'undefined') {
06992                 break;
06993             }
06994             consequent.push(statement);
06995         }
06996 
06997         return {
06998             type: Syntax.SwitchCase,
06999             test: test,
07000             consequent: consequent
07001         };
07002     }
07003 
07004     function parseSwitchStatement() {
07005         var discriminant, cases, clause, oldInSwitch, defaultFound;
07006 
07007         expectKeyword('switch');
07008 
07009         expect('(');
07010 
07011         discriminant = parseExpression();
07012 
07013         expect(')');
07014 
07015         expect('{');
07016 
07017         if (match('}')) {
07018             lex();
07019             return {
07020                 type: Syntax.SwitchStatement,
07021                 discriminant: discriminant
07022             };
07023         }
07024 
07025         cases = [];
07026 
07027         oldInSwitch = state.inSwitch;
07028         state.inSwitch = true;
07029         defaultFound = false;
07030 
07031         while (index < length) {
07032             if (match('}')) {
07033                 break;
07034             }
07035             clause = parseSwitchCase();
07036             if (clause.test === null) {
07037                 if (defaultFound) {
07038                     throwError({}, Messages.MultipleDefaultsInSwitch);
07039                 }
07040                 defaultFound = true;
07041             }
07042             cases.push(clause);
07043         }
07044 
07045         state.inSwitch = oldInSwitch;
07046 
07047         expect('}');
07048 
07049         return {
07050             type: Syntax.SwitchStatement,
07051             discriminant: discriminant,
07052             cases: cases
07053         };
07054     }
07055 
07056     // 12.13 The throw statement
07057 
07058     function parseThrowStatement() {
07059         var argument;
07060 
07061         expectKeyword('throw');
07062 
07063         if (peekLineTerminator()) {
07064             throwError({}, Messages.NewlineAfterThrow);
07065         }
07066 
07067         argument = parseExpression();
07068 
07069         consumeSemicolon();
07070 
07071         return {
07072             type: Syntax.ThrowStatement,
07073             argument: argument
07074         };
07075     }
07076 
07077     // 12.14 The try statement
07078 
07079     function parseCatchClause() {
07080         var param;
07081 
07082         expectKeyword('catch');
07083 
07084         expect('(');
07085         if (match(')')) {
07086             throwUnexpected(lookahead());
07087         }
07088 
07089         param = parseVariableIdentifier();
07090         // 12.14.1
07091         if (strict && isRestrictedWord(param.name)) {
07092             throwErrorTolerant({}, Messages.StrictCatchVariable);
07093         }
07094 
07095         expect(')');
07096 
07097         return {
07098             type: Syntax.CatchClause,
07099             param: param,
07100             body: parseBlock()
07101         };
07102     }
07103 
07104     function parseTryStatement() {
07105         var block, handlers = [], finalizer = null;
07106 
07107         expectKeyword('try');
07108 
07109         block = parseBlock();
07110 
07111         if (matchKeyword('catch')) {
07112             handlers.push(parseCatchClause());
07113         }
07114 
07115         if (matchKeyword('finally')) {
07116             lex();
07117             finalizer = parseBlock();
07118         }
07119 
07120         if (handlers.length === 0 && !finalizer) {
07121             throwError({}, Messages.NoCatchOrFinally);
07122         }
07123 
07124         return {
07125             type: Syntax.TryStatement,
07126             block: block,
07127             guardedHandlers: [],
07128             handlers: handlers,
07129             finalizer: finalizer
07130         };
07131     }
07132 
07133     // 12.15 The debugger statement
07134 
07135     function parseDebuggerStatement() {
07136         expectKeyword('debugger');
07137 
07138         consumeSemicolon();
07139 
07140         return {
07141             type: Syntax.DebuggerStatement
07142         };
07143     }
07144 
07145     // 12 Statements
07146 
07147     function parseStatement() {
07148         var token = lookahead(),
07149             expr,
07150             labeledBody;
07151 
07152         if (token.type === Token.EOF) {
07153             throwUnexpected(token);
07154         }
07155 
07156         if (token.type === Token.Punctuator) {
07157             switch (token.value) {
07158             case ';':
07159                 return parseEmptyStatement();
07160             case '{':
07161                 return parseBlock();
07162             case '(':
07163                 return parseExpressionStatement();
07164             default:
07165                 break;
07166             }
07167         }
07168 
07169         if (token.type === Token.Keyword) {
07170             switch (token.value) {
07171             case 'break':
07172                 return parseBreakStatement();
07173             case 'continue':
07174                 return parseContinueStatement();
07175             case 'debugger':
07176                 return parseDebuggerStatement();
07177             case 'do':
07178                 return parseDoWhileStatement();
07179             case 'for':
07180                 return parseForStatement();
07181             case 'function':
07182                 return parseFunctionDeclaration();
07183             case 'if':
07184                 return parseIfStatement();
07185             case 'return':
07186                 return parseReturnStatement();
07187             case 'switch':
07188                 return parseSwitchStatement();
07189             case 'throw':
07190                 return parseThrowStatement();
07191             case 'try':
07192                 return parseTryStatement();
07193             case 'var':
07194                 return parseVariableStatement();
07195             case 'while':
07196                 return parseWhileStatement();
07197             case 'with':
07198                 return parseWithStatement();
07199             default:
07200                 break;
07201             }
07202         }
07203 
07204         expr = parseExpression();
07205 
07206         // 12.12 Labelled Statements
07207         if ((expr.type === Syntax.Identifier) && match(':')) {
07208             lex();
07209 
07210             if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(state.labelSet, expr.name)) {
07211                 throwError({}, Messages.Redeclaration, 'Label', expr.name);
07212             }
07213 
07214             state.labelSet[expr.name] = true;
07215             labeledBody = parseStatement();
07216             delete state.labelSet[expr.name];
07217 
07218             return {
07219                 type: Syntax.LabeledStatement,
07220                 label: expr,
07221                 body: labeledBody
07222             };
07223         }
07224 
07225         consumeSemicolon();
07226 
07227         return {
07228             type: Syntax.ExpressionStatement,
07229             expression: expr
07230         };
07231     }
07232 
07233     // 13 Function Definition
07234 
07235     function parseFunctionSourceElements() {
07236         var sourceElement, sourceElements = [], token, directive, firstRestricted,
07237             oldLabelSet, oldInIteration, oldInSwitch, oldInFunctionBody;
07238 
07239         expect('{');
07240 
07241         while (index < length) {
07242             token = lookahead();
07243             if (token.type !== Token.StringLiteral) {
07244                 break;
07245             }
07246 
07247             sourceElement = parseSourceElement();
07248             sourceElements.push(sourceElement);
07249             if (sourceElement.expression.type !== Syntax.Literal) {
07250                 // this is not directive
07251                 break;
07252             }
07253             directive = sliceSource(token.range[0] + 1, token.range[1] - 1);
07254             if (directive === 'use strict') {
07255                 strict = true;
07256                 if (firstRestricted) {
07257                     throwErrorTolerant(firstRestricted, Messages.StrictOctalLiteral);
07258                 }
07259             } else {
07260                 if (!firstRestricted && token.octal) {
07261                     firstRestricted = token;
07262                 }
07263             }
07264         }
07265 
07266         oldLabelSet = state.labelSet;
07267         oldInIteration = state.inIteration;
07268         oldInSwitch = state.inSwitch;
07269         oldInFunctionBody = state.inFunctionBody;
07270 
07271         state.labelSet = {};
07272         state.inIteration = false;
07273         state.inSwitch = false;
07274         state.inFunctionBody = true;
07275 
07276         while (index < length) {
07277             if (match('}')) {
07278                 break;
07279             }
07280             sourceElement = parseSourceElement();
07281             if (typeof sourceElement === 'undefined') {
07282                 break;
07283             }
07284             sourceElements.push(sourceElement);
07285         }
07286 
07287         expect('}');
07288 
07289         state.labelSet = oldLabelSet;
07290         state.inIteration = oldInIteration;
07291         state.inSwitch = oldInSwitch;
07292         state.inFunctionBody = oldInFunctionBody;
07293 
07294         return {
07295             type: Syntax.BlockStatement,
07296             body: sourceElements
07297         };
07298     }
07299 
07300     function parseFunctionDeclaration() {
07301         var id, param, params = [], body, token, stricted, firstRestricted, message, previousStrict, paramSet;
07302 
07303         expectKeyword('function');
07304         token = lookahead();
07305         id = parseVariableIdentifier();
07306         if (strict) {
07307             if (isRestrictedWord(token.value)) {
07308                 throwErrorTolerant(token, Messages.StrictFunctionName);
07309             }
07310         } else {
07311             if (isRestrictedWord(token.value)) {
07312                 firstRestricted = token;
07313                 message = Messages.StrictFunctionName;
07314             } else if (isStrictModeReservedWord(token.value)) {
07315                 firstRestricted = token;
07316                 message = Messages.StrictReservedWord;
07317             }
07318         }
07319 
07320         expect('(');
07321 
07322         if (!match(')')) {
07323             paramSet = {};
07324             while (index < length) {
07325                 token = lookahead();
07326                 param = parseVariableIdentifier();
07327                 if (strict) {
07328                     if (isRestrictedWord(token.value)) {
07329                         stricted = token;
07330                         message = Messages.StrictParamName;
07331                     }
07332                     if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(paramSet, token.value)) {
07333                         stricted = token;
07334                         message = Messages.StrictParamDupe;
07335                     }
07336                 } else if (!firstRestricted) {
07337                     if (isRestrictedWord(token.value)) {
07338                         firstRestricted = token;
07339                         message = Messages.StrictParamName;
07340                     } else if (isStrictModeReservedWord(token.value)) {
07341                         firstRestricted = token;
07342                         message = Messages.StrictReservedWord;
07343                     } else if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(paramSet, token.value)) {
07344                         firstRestricted = token;
07345                         message = Messages.StrictParamDupe;
07346                     }
07347                 }
07348                 params.push(param);
07349                 paramSet[param.name] = true;
07350                 if (match(')')) {
07351                     break;
07352                 }
07353                 expect(',');
07354             }
07355         }
07356 
07357         expect(')');
07358 
07359         previousStrict = strict;
07360         body = parseFunctionSourceElements();
07361         if (strict && firstRestricted) {
07362             throwError(firstRestricted, message);
07363         }
07364         if (strict && stricted) {
07365             throwErrorTolerant(stricted, message);
07366         }
07367         strict = previousStrict;
07368 
07369         return {
07370             type: Syntax.FunctionDeclaration,
07371             id: id,
07372             params: params,
07373             defaults: [],
07374             body: body,
07375             rest: null,
07376             generator: false,
07377             expression: false
07378         };
07379     }
07380 
07381     function parseFunctionExpression() {
07382         var token, id = null, stricted, firstRestricted, message, param, params = [], body, previousStrict, paramSet;
07383 
07384         expectKeyword('function');
07385 
07386         if (!match('(')) {
07387             token = lookahead();
07388             id = parseVariableIdentifier();
07389             if (strict) {
07390                 if (isRestrictedWord(token.value)) {
07391                     throwErrorTolerant(token, Messages.StrictFunctionName);
07392                 }
07393             } else {
07394                 if (isRestrictedWord(token.value)) {
07395                     firstRestricted = token;
07396                     message = Messages.StrictFunctionName;
07397                 } else if (isStrictModeReservedWord(token.value)) {
07398                     firstRestricted = token;
07399                     message = Messages.StrictReservedWord;
07400                 }
07401             }
07402         }
07403 
07404         expect('(');
07405 
07406         if (!match(')')) {
07407             paramSet = {};
07408             while (index < length) {
07409                 token = lookahead();
07410                 param = parseVariableIdentifier();
07411                 if (strict) {
07412                     if (isRestrictedWord(token.value)) {
07413                         stricted = token;
07414                         message = Messages.StrictParamName;
07415                     }
07416                     if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(paramSet, token.value)) {
07417                         stricted = token;
07418                         message = Messages.StrictParamDupe;
07419                     }
07420                 } else if (!firstRestricted) {
07421                     if (isRestrictedWord(token.value)) {
07422                         firstRestricted = token;
07423                         message = Messages.StrictParamName;
07424                     } else if (isStrictModeReservedWord(token.value)) {
07425                         firstRestricted = token;
07426                         message = Messages.StrictReservedWord;
07427                     } else if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(paramSet, token.value)) {
07428                         firstRestricted = token;
07429                         message = Messages.StrictParamDupe;
07430                     }
07431                 }
07432                 params.push(param);
07433                 paramSet[param.name] = true;
07434                 if (match(')')) {
07435                     break;
07436                 }
07437                 expect(',');
07438             }
07439         }
07440 
07441         expect(')');
07442 
07443         previousStrict = strict;
07444         body = parseFunctionSourceElements();
07445         if (strict && firstRestricted) {
07446             throwError(firstRestricted, message);
07447         }
07448         if (strict && stricted) {
07449             throwErrorTolerant(stricted, message);
07450         }
07451         strict = previousStrict;
07452 
07453         return {
07454             type: Syntax.FunctionExpression,
07455             id: id,
07456             params: params,
07457             defaults: [],
07458             body: body,
07459             rest: null,
07460             generator: false,
07461             expression: false
07462         };
07463     }
07464 
07465     // 14 Program
07466 
07467     function parseSourceElement() {
07468         var token = lookahead();
07469 
07470         if (token.type === Token.Keyword) {
07471             switch (token.value) {
07472             case 'const':
07473             case 'let':
07474                 return parseConstLetDeclaration(token.value);
07475             case 'function':
07476                 return parseFunctionDeclaration();
07477             default:
07478                 return parseStatement();
07479             }
07480         }
07481 
07482         if (token.type !== Token.EOF) {
07483             return parseStatement();
07484         }
07485     }
07486 
07487     function parseSourceElements() {
07488         var sourceElement, sourceElements = [], token, directive, firstRestricted;
07489 
07490         while (index < length) {
07491             token = lookahead();
07492             if (token.type !== Token.StringLiteral) {
07493                 break;
07494             }
07495 
07496             sourceElement = parseSourceElement();
07497             sourceElements.push(sourceElement);
07498             if (sourceElement.expression.type !== Syntax.Literal) {
07499                 // this is not directive
07500                 break;
07501             }
07502             directive = sliceSource(token.range[0] + 1, token.range[1] - 1);
07503             if (directive === 'use strict') {
07504                 strict = true;
07505                 if (firstRestricted) {
07506                     throwErrorTolerant(firstRestricted, Messages.StrictOctalLiteral);
07507                 }
07508             } else {
07509                 if (!firstRestricted && token.octal) {
07510                     firstRestricted = token;
07511                 }
07512             }
07513         }
07514 
07515         while (index < length) {
07516             sourceElement = parseSourceElement();
07517             if (typeof sourceElement === 'undefined') {
07518                 break;
07519             }
07520             sourceElements.push(sourceElement);
07521         }
07522         return sourceElements;
07523     }
07524 
07525     function parseProgram() {
07526         var program;
07527         strict = false;
07528         program = {
07529             type: Syntax.Program,
07530             body: parseSourceElements()
07531         };
07532         return program;
07533     }
07534 
07535     // The following functions are needed only when the option to preserve
07536     // the comments is active.
07537 
07538     function addComment(type, value, start, end, loc) {
07539         assert(typeof start === 'number', 'Comment must have valid position');
07540 
07541         // Because the way the actual token is scanned, often the comments
07542         // (if any) are skipped twice during the lexical analysis.
07543         // Thus, we need to skip adding a comment if the comment array already
07544         // handled it.
07545         if (extra.comments.length > 0) {
07546             if (extra.comments[extra.comments.length - 1].range[1] > start) {
07547                 return;
07548             }
07549         }
07550 
07551         extra.comments.push({
07552             type: type,
07553             value: value,
07554             range: [start, end],
07555             loc: loc
07556         });
07557     }
07558 
07559     function scanComment() {
07560         var comment, ch, loc, start, blockComment, lineComment;
07561 
07562         comment = '';
07563         blockComment = false;
07564         lineComment = false;
07565 
07566         while (index < length) {
07567             ch = source[index];
07568 
07569             if (lineComment) {
07570                 ch = source[index++];
07571                 if (isLineTerminator(ch)) {
07572                     loc.end = {
07573                         line: lineNumber,
07574                         column: index - lineStart - 1
07575                     };
07576                     lineComment = false;
07577                     addComment('Line', comment, start, index - 1, loc);
07578                     if (ch === '\r' && source[index] === '\n') {
07579                         ++index;
07580                     }
07581                     ++lineNumber;
07582                     lineStart = index;
07583                     comment = '';
07584                 } else if (index >= length) {
07585                     lineComment = false;
07586                     comment += ch;
07587                     loc.end = {
07588                         line: lineNumber,
07589                         column: length - lineStart
07590                     };
07591                     addComment('Line', comment, start, length, loc);
07592                 } else {
07593                     comment += ch;
07594                 }
07595             } else if (blockComment) {
07596                 if (isLineTerminator(ch)) {
07597                     if (ch === '\r' && source[index + 1] === '\n') {
07598                         ++index;
07599                         comment += '\r\n';
07600                     } else {
07601                         comment += ch;
07602                     }
07603                     ++lineNumber;
07604                     ++index;
07605                     lineStart = index;
07606                     if (index >= length) {
07607                         throwError({}, Messages.UnexpectedToken, 'ILLEGAL');
07608                     }
07609                 } else {
07610                     ch = source[index++];
07611                     if (index >= length) {
07612                         throwError({}, Messages.UnexpectedToken, 'ILLEGAL');
07613                     }
07614                     comment += ch;
07615                     if (ch === '*') {
07616                         ch = source[index];
07617                         if (ch === '/') {
07618                             comment = comment.substr(0, comment.length - 1);
07619                             blockComment = false;
07620                             ++index;
07621                             loc.end = {
07622                                 line: lineNumber,
07623                                 column: index - lineStart
07624                             };
07625                             addComment('Block', comment, start, index, loc);
07626                             comment = '';
07627                         }
07628                     }
07629                 }
07630             } else if (ch === '/') {
07631                 ch = source[index + 1];
07632                 if (ch === '/') {
07633                     loc = {
07634                         start: {
07635                             line: lineNumber,
07636                             column: index - lineStart
07637                         }
07638                     };
07639                     start = index;
07640                     index += 2;
07641                     lineComment = true;
07642                     if (index >= length) {
07643                         loc.end = {
07644                             line: lineNumber,
07645                             column: index - lineStart
07646                         };
07647                         lineComment = false;
07648                         addComment('Line', comment, start, index, loc);
07649                     }
07650                 } else if (ch === '*') {
07651                     start = index;
07652                     index += 2;
07653                     blockComment = true;
07654                     loc = {
07655                         start: {
07656                             line: lineNumber,
07657                             column: index - lineStart - 2
07658                         }
07659                     };
07660                     if (index >= length) {
07661                         throwError({}, Messages.UnexpectedToken, 'ILLEGAL');
07662                     }
07663                 } else {
07664                     break;
07665                 }
07666             } else if (isWhiteSpace(ch)) {
07667                 ++index;
07668             } else if (isLineTerminator(ch)) {
07669                 ++index;
07670                 if (ch ===  '\r' && source[index] === '\n') {
07671                     ++index;
07672                 }
07673                 ++lineNumber;
07674                 lineStart = index;
07675             } else {
07676                 break;
07677             }
07678         }
07679     }
07680 
07681     function filterCommentLocation() {
07682         var i, entry, comment, comments = [];
07683 
07684         for (i = 0; i < extra.comments.length; ++i) {
07685             entry = extra.comments[i];
07686             comment = {
07687                 type: entry.type,
07688                 value: entry.value
07689             };
07690             if (extra.range) {
07691                 comment.range = entry.range;
07692             }
07693             if (extra.loc) {
07694                 comment.loc = entry.loc;
07695             }
07696             comments.push(comment);
07697         }
07698 
07699         extra.comments = comments;
07700     }
07701 
07702     function collectToken() {
07703         var start, loc, token, range, value;
07704 
07705         skipComment();
07706         start = index;
07707         loc = {
07708             start: {
07709                 line: lineNumber,
07710                 column: index - lineStart
07711             }
07712         };
07713 
07714         token = extra.advance();
07715         loc.end = {
07716             line: lineNumber,
07717             column: index - lineStart
07718         };
07719 
07720         if (token.type !== Token.EOF) {
07721             range = [token.range[0], token.range[1]];
07722             value = sliceSource(token.range[0], token.range[1]);
07723             extra.tokens.push({
07724                 type: TokenName[token.type],
07725                 value: value,
07726                 range: range,
07727                 loc: loc
07728             });
07729         }
07730 
07731         return token;
07732     }
07733 
07734     function collectRegex() {
07735         var pos, loc, regex, token;
07736 
07737         skipComment();
07738 
07739         pos = index;
07740         loc = {
07741             start: {
07742                 line: lineNumber,
07743                 column: index - lineStart
07744             }
07745         };
07746 
07747         regex = extra.scanRegExp();
07748         loc.end = {
07749             line: lineNumber,
07750             column: index - lineStart
07751         };
07752 
07753         // Pop the previous token, which is likely '/' or '/='
07754         if (extra.tokens.length > 0) {
07755             token = extra.tokens[extra.tokens.length - 1];
07756             if (token.range[0] === pos && token.type === 'Punctuator') {
07757                 if (token.value === '/' || token.value === '/=') {
07758                     extra.tokens.pop();
07759                 }
07760             }
07761         }
07762 
07763         extra.tokens.push({
07764             type: 'RegularExpression',
07765             value: regex.literal,
07766             range: [pos, index],
07767             loc: loc
07768         });
07769 
07770         return regex;
07771     }
07772 
07773     function filterTokenLocation() {
07774         var i, entry, token, tokens = [];
07775 
07776         for (i = 0; i < extra.tokens.length; ++i) {
07777             entry = extra.tokens[i];
07778             token = {
07779                 type: entry.type,
07780                 value: entry.value
07781             };
07782             if (extra.range) {
07783                 token.range = entry.range;
07784             }
07785             if (extra.loc) {
07786                 token.loc = entry.loc;
07787             }
07788             tokens.push(token);
07789         }
07790 
07791         extra.tokens = tokens;
07792     }
07793 
07794     function createLiteral(token) {
07795         return {
07796             type: Syntax.Literal,
07797             value: token.value
07798         };
07799     }
07800 
07801     function createRawLiteral(token) {
07802         return {
07803             type: Syntax.Literal,
07804             value: token.value,
07805             raw: sliceSource(token.range[0], token.range[1])
07806         };
07807     }
07808 
07809     function createLocationMarker() {
07810         var marker = {};
07811 
07812         marker.range = [index, index];
07813         marker.loc = {
07814             start: {
07815                 line: lineNumber,
07816                 column: index - lineStart
07817             },
07818             end: {
07819                 line: lineNumber,
07820                 column: index - lineStart
07821             }
07822         };
07823 
07824         marker.end = function () {
07825             this.range[1] = index;
07826             this.loc.end.line = lineNumber;
07827             this.loc.end.column = index - lineStart;
07828         };
07829 
07830         marker.applyGroup = function (node) {
07831             if (extra.range) {
07832                 node.groupRange = [this.range[0], this.range[1]];
07833             }
07834             if (extra.loc) {
07835                 node.groupLoc = {
07836                     start: {
07837                         line: this.loc.start.line,
07838                         column: this.loc.start.column
07839                     },
07840                     end: {
07841                         line: this.loc.end.line,
07842                         column: this.loc.end.column
07843                     }
07844                 };
07845             }
07846         };
07847 
07848         marker.apply = function (node) {
07849             if (extra.range) {
07850                 node.range = [this.range[0], this.range[1]];
07851             }
07852             if (extra.loc) {
07853                 node.loc = {
07854                     start: {
07855                         line: this.loc.start.line,
07856                         column: this.loc.start.column
07857                     },
07858                     end: {
07859                         line: this.loc.end.line,
07860                         column: this.loc.end.column
07861                     }
07862                 };
07863             }
07864         };
07865 
07866         return marker;
07867     }
07868 
07869     function trackGroupExpression() {
07870         var marker, expr;
07871 
07872         skipComment();
07873         marker = createLocationMarker();
07874         expect('(');
07875 
07876         expr = parseExpression();
07877 
07878         expect(')');
07879 
07880         marker.end();
07881         marker.applyGroup(expr);
07882 
07883         return expr;
07884     }
07885 
07886     function trackLeftHandSideExpression() {
07887         var marker, expr;
07888 
07889         skipComment();
07890         marker = createLocationMarker();
07891 
07892         expr = matchKeyword('new') ? parseNewExpression() : parsePrimaryExpression();
07893 
07894         while (match('.') || match('[')) {
07895             if (match('[')) {
07896                 expr = {
07897                     type: Syntax.MemberExpression,
07898                     computed: true,
07899                     object: expr,
07900                     property: parseComputedMember()
07901                 };
07902                 marker.end();
07903                 marker.apply(expr);
07904             } else {
07905                 expr = {
07906                     type: Syntax.MemberExpression,
07907                     computed: false,
07908                     object: expr,
07909                     property: parseNonComputedMember()
07910                 };
07911                 marker.end();
07912                 marker.apply(expr);
07913             }
07914         }
07915 
07916         return expr;
07917     }
07918 
07919     function trackLeftHandSideExpressionAllowCall() {
07920         var marker, expr;
07921 
07922         skipComment();
07923         marker = createLocationMarker();
07924 
07925         expr = matchKeyword('new') ? parseNewExpression() : parsePrimaryExpression();
07926 
07927         while (match('.') || match('[') || match('(')) {
07928             if (match('(')) {
07929                 expr = {
07930                     type: Syntax.CallExpression,
07931                     callee: expr,
07932                     'arguments': parseArguments()
07933                 };
07934                 marker.end();
07935                 marker.apply(expr);
07936             } else if (match('[')) {
07937                 expr = {
07938                     type: Syntax.MemberExpression,
07939                     computed: true,
07940                     object: expr,
07941                     property: parseComputedMember()
07942                 };
07943                 marker.end();
07944                 marker.apply(expr);
07945             } else {
07946                 expr = {
07947                     type: Syntax.MemberExpression,
07948                     computed: false,
07949                     object: expr,
07950                     property: parseNonComputedMember()
07951                 };
07952                 marker.end();
07953                 marker.apply(expr);
07954             }
07955         }
07956 
07957         return expr;
07958     }
07959 
07960     function filterGroup(node) {
07961         var n, i, entry;
07962 
07963         n = (Object.prototype.toString.apply(node) === '[object Array]') ? [] : {};
07964         for (i in node) {
07965             if (node.hasOwnProperty(i) && i !== 'groupRange' && i !== 'groupLoc') {
07966                 entry = node[i];
07967                 if (entry === null || typeof entry !== 'object' || entry instanceof RegExp) {
07968                     n[i] = entry;
07969                 } else {
07970                     n[i] = filterGroup(entry);
07971                 }
07972             }
07973         }
07974         return n;
07975     }
07976 
07977     function wrapTrackingFunction(range, loc) {
07978 
07979         return function (parseFunction) {
07980 
07981             function isBinary(node) {
07982                 return node.type === Syntax.LogicalExpression ||
07983                     node.type === Syntax.BinaryExpression;
07984             }
07985 
07986             function visit(node) {
07987                 var start, end;
07988 
07989                 if (isBinary(node.left)) {
07990                     visit(node.left);
07991                 }
07992                 if (isBinary(node.right)) {
07993                     visit(node.right);
07994                 }
07995 
07996                 if (range) {
07997                     if (node.left.groupRange || node.right.groupRange) {
07998                         start = node.left.groupRange ? node.left.groupRange[0] : node.left.range[0];
07999                         end = node.right.groupRange ? node.right.groupRange[1] : node.right.range[1];
08000                         node.range = [start, end];
08001                     } else if (typeof node.range === 'undefined') {
08002                         start = node.left.range[0];
08003                         end = node.right.range[1];
08004                         node.range = [start, end];
08005                     }
08006                 }
08007                 if (loc) {
08008                     if (node.left.groupLoc || node.right.groupLoc) {
08009                         start = node.left.groupLoc ? node.left.groupLoc.start : node.left.loc.start;
08010                         end = node.right.groupLoc ? node.right.groupLoc.end : node.right.loc.end;
08011                         node.loc = {
08012                             start: start,
08013                             end: end
08014                         };
08015                     } else if (typeof node.loc === 'undefined') {
08016                         node.loc = {
08017                             start: node.left.loc.start,
08018                             end: node.right.loc.end
08019                         };
08020                     }
08021                 }
08022             }
08023 
08024             return function () {
08025                 var marker, node;
08026 
08027                 skipComment();
08028 
08029                 marker = createLocationMarker();
08030                 node = parseFunction.apply(null, arguments);
08031                 marker.end();
08032 
08033                 if (range && typeof node.range === 'undefined') {
08034                     marker.apply(node);
08035                 }
08036 
08037                 if (loc && typeof node.loc === 'undefined') {
08038                     marker.apply(node);
08039                 }
08040 
08041                 if (isBinary(node)) {
08042                     visit(node);
08043                 }
08044 
08045                 return node;
08046             };
08047         };
08048     }
08049 
08050     function patch() {
08051 
08052         var wrapTracking;
08053 
08054         if (extra.comments) {
08055             extra.skipComment = skipComment;
08056             skipComment = scanComment;
08057         }
08058 
08059         if (extra.raw) {
08060             extra.createLiteral = createLiteral;
08061             createLiteral = createRawLiteral;
08062         }
08063 
08064         if (extra.range || extra.loc) {
08065 
08066             extra.parseGroupExpression = parseGroupExpression;
08067             extra.parseLeftHandSideExpression = parseLeftHandSideExpression;
08068             extra.parseLeftHandSideExpressionAllowCall = parseLeftHandSideExpressionAllowCall;
08069             parseGroupExpression = trackGroupExpression;
08070             parseLeftHandSideExpression = trackLeftHandSideExpression;
08071             parseLeftHandSideExpressionAllowCall = trackLeftHandSideExpressionAllowCall;
08072 
08073             wrapTracking = wrapTrackingFunction(extra.range, extra.loc);
08074 
08075             extra.parseAdditiveExpression = parseAdditiveExpression;
08076             extra.parseAssignmentExpression = parseAssignmentExpression;
08077             extra.parseBitwiseANDExpression = parseBitwiseANDExpression;
08078             extra.parseBitwiseORExpression = parseBitwiseORExpression;
08079             extra.parseBitwiseXORExpression = parseBitwiseXORExpression;
08080             extra.parseBlock = parseBlock;
08081             extra.parseFunctionSourceElements = parseFunctionSourceElements;
08082             extra.parseCatchClause = parseCatchClause;
08083             extra.parseComputedMember = parseComputedMember;
08084             extra.parseConditionalExpression = parseConditionalExpression;
08085             extra.parseConstLetDeclaration = parseConstLetDeclaration;
08086             extra.parseEqualityExpression = parseEqualityExpression;
08087             extra.parseExpression = parseExpression;
08088             extra.parseForVariableDeclaration = parseForVariableDeclaration;
08089             extra.parseFunctionDeclaration = parseFunctionDeclaration;
08090             extra.parseFunctionExpression = parseFunctionExpression;
08091             extra.parseLogicalANDExpression = parseLogicalANDExpression;
08092             extra.parseLogicalORExpression = parseLogicalORExpression;
08093             extra.parseMultiplicativeExpression = parseMultiplicativeExpression;
08094             extra.parseNewExpression = parseNewExpression;
08095             extra.parseNonComputedProperty = parseNonComputedProperty;
08096             extra.parseObjectProperty = parseObjectProperty;
08097             extra.parseObjectPropertyKey = parseObjectPropertyKey;
08098             extra.parsePostfixExpression = parsePostfixExpression;
08099             extra.parsePrimaryExpression = parsePrimaryExpression;
08100             extra.parseProgram = parseProgram;
08101             extra.parsePropertyFunction = parsePropertyFunction;
08102             extra.parseRelationalExpression = parseRelationalExpression;
08103             extra.parseStatement = parseStatement;
08104             extra.parseShiftExpression = parseShiftExpression;
08105             extra.parseSwitchCase = parseSwitchCase;
08106             extra.parseUnaryExpression = parseUnaryExpression;
08107             extra.parseVariableDeclaration = parseVariableDeclaration;
08108             extra.parseVariableIdentifier = parseVariableIdentifier;
08109 
08110             parseAdditiveExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parseAdditiveExpression);
08111             parseAssignmentExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parseAssignmentExpression);
08112             parseBitwiseANDExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parseBitwiseANDExpression);
08113             parseBitwiseORExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parseBitwiseORExpression);
08114             parseBitwiseXORExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parseBitwiseXORExpression);
08115             parseBlock = wrapTracking(extra.parseBlock);
08116             parseFunctionSourceElements = wrapTracking(extra.parseFunctionSourceElements);
08117             parseCatchClause = wrapTracking(extra.parseCatchClause);
08118             parseComputedMember = wrapTracking(extra.parseComputedMember);
08119             parseConditionalExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parseConditionalExpression);
08120             parseConstLetDeclaration = wrapTracking(extra.parseConstLetDeclaration);
08121             parseEqualityExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parseEqualityExpression);
08122             parseExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parseExpression);
08123             parseForVariableDeclaration = wrapTracking(extra.parseForVariableDeclaration);
08124             parseFunctionDeclaration = wrapTracking(extra.parseFunctionDeclaration);
08125             parseFunctionExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parseFunctionExpression);
08126             parseLeftHandSideExpression = wrapTracking(parseLeftHandSideExpression);
08127             parseLogicalANDExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parseLogicalANDExpression);
08128             parseLogicalORExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parseLogicalORExpression);
08129             parseMultiplicativeExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parseMultiplicativeExpression);
08130             parseNewExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parseNewExpression);
08131             parseNonComputedProperty = wrapTracking(extra.parseNonComputedProperty);
08132             parseObjectProperty = wrapTracking(extra.parseObjectProperty);
08133             parseObjectPropertyKey = wrapTracking(extra.parseObjectPropertyKey);
08134             parsePostfixExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parsePostfixExpression);
08135             parsePrimaryExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parsePrimaryExpression);
08136             parseProgram = wrapTracking(extra.parseProgram);
08137             parsePropertyFunction = wrapTracking(extra.parsePropertyFunction);
08138             parseRelationalExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parseRelationalExpression);
08139             parseStatement = wrapTracking(extra.parseStatement);
08140             parseShiftExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parseShiftExpression);
08141             parseSwitchCase = wrapTracking(extra.parseSwitchCase);
08142             parseUnaryExpression = wrapTracking(extra.parseUnaryExpression);
08143             parseVariableDeclaration = wrapTracking(extra.parseVariableDeclaration);
08144             parseVariableIdentifier = wrapTracking(extra.parseVariableIdentifier);
08145         }
08146 
08147         if (typeof extra.tokens !== 'undefined') {
08148             extra.advance = advance;
08149             extra.scanRegExp = scanRegExp;
08150 
08151             advance = collectToken;
08152             scanRegExp = collectRegex;
08153         }
08154     }
08155 
08156     function unpatch() {
08157         if (typeof extra.skipComment === 'function') {
08158             skipComment = extra.skipComment;
08159         }
08160 
08161         if (extra.raw) {
08162             createLiteral = extra.createLiteral;
08163         }
08164 
08165         if (extra.range || extra.loc) {
08166             parseAdditiveExpression = extra.parseAdditiveExpression;
08167             parseAssignmentExpression = extra.parseAssignmentExpression;
08168             parseBitwiseANDExpression = extra.parseBitwiseANDExpression;
08169             parseBitwiseORExpression = extra.parseBitwiseORExpression;
08170             parseBitwiseXORExpression = extra.parseBitwiseXORExpression;
08171             parseBlock = extra.parseBlock;
08172             parseFunctionSourceElements = extra.parseFunctionSourceElements;
08173             parseCatchClause = extra.parseCatchClause;
08174             parseComputedMember = extra.parseComputedMember;
08175             parseConditionalExpression = extra.parseConditionalExpression;
08176             parseConstLetDeclaration = extra.parseConstLetDeclaration;
08177             parseEqualityExpression = extra.parseEqualityExpression;
08178             parseExpression = extra.parseExpression;
08179             parseForVariableDeclaration = extra.parseForVariableDeclaration;
08180             parseFunctionDeclaration = extra.parseFunctionDeclaration;
08181             parseFunctionExpression = extra.parseFunctionExpression;
08182             parseGroupExpression = extra.parseGroupExpression;
08183             parseLeftHandSideExpression = extra.parseLeftHandSideExpression;
08184             parseLeftHandSideExpressionAllowCall = extra.parseLeftHandSideExpressionAllowCall;
08185             parseLogicalANDExpression = extra.parseLogicalANDExpression;
08186             parseLogicalORExpression = extra.parseLogicalORExpression;
08187             parseMultiplicativeExpression = extra.parseMultiplicativeExpression;
08188             parseNewExpression = extra.parseNewExpression;
08189             parseNonComputedProperty = extra.parseNonComputedProperty;
08190             parseObjectProperty = extra.parseObjectProperty;
08191             parseObjectPropertyKey = extra.parseObjectPropertyKey;
08192             parsePrimaryExpression = extra.parsePrimaryExpression;
08193             parsePostfixExpression = extra.parsePostfixExpression;
08194             parseProgram = extra.parseProgram;
08195             parsePropertyFunction = extra.parsePropertyFunction;
08196             parseRelationalExpression = extra.parseRelationalExpression;
08197             parseStatement = extra.parseStatement;
08198             parseShiftExpression = extra.parseShiftExpression;
08199             parseSwitchCase = extra.parseSwitchCase;
08200             parseUnaryExpression = extra.parseUnaryExpression;
08201             parseVariableDeclaration = extra.parseVariableDeclaration;
08202             parseVariableIdentifier = extra.parseVariableIdentifier;
08203         }
08204 
08205         if (typeof extra.scanRegExp === 'function') {
08206             advance = extra.advance;
08207             scanRegExp = extra.scanRegExp;
08208         }
08209     }
08210 
08211     function stringToArray(str) {
08212         var length = str.length,
08213             result = [],
08214             i;
08215         for (i = 0; i < length; ++i) {
08216             result[i] = str.charAt(i);
08217         }
08218         return result;
08219     }
08220 
08221     function parse(code, options) {
08222         var program, toString;
08223 
08224         toString = String;
08225         if (typeof code !== 'string' && !(code instanceof String)) {
08226             code = toString(code);
08227         }
08228 
08229         source = code;
08230         index = 0;
08231         lineNumber = (source.length > 0) ? 1 : 0;
08232         lineStart = 0;
08233         length = source.length;
08234         buffer = null;
08235         state = {
08236             allowIn: true,
08237             labelSet: {},
08238             inFunctionBody: false,
08239             inIteration: false,
08240             inSwitch: false
08241         };
08242 
08243         extra = {};
08244         if (typeof options !== 'undefined') {
08245             extra.range = (typeof options.range === 'boolean') && options.range;
08246             extra.loc = (typeof options.loc === 'boolean') && options.loc;
08247             extra.raw = (typeof options.raw === 'boolean') && options.raw;
08248             if (typeof options.tokens === 'boolean' && options.tokens) {
08249                 extra.tokens = [];
08250             }
08251             if (typeof options.comment === 'boolean' && options.comment) {
08252                 extra.comments = [];
08253             }
08254             if (typeof options.tolerant === 'boolean' && options.tolerant) {
08255                 extra.errors = [];
08256             }
08257         }
08258 
08259         if (length > 0) {
08260             if (typeof source[0] === 'undefined') {
08261                 // Try first to convert to a string. This is good as fast path
08262                 // for old IE which understands string indexing for string
08263                 // literals only and not for string object.
08264                 if (code instanceof String) {
08265                     source = code.valueOf();
08266                 }
08267 
08268                 // Force accessing the characters via an array.
08269                 if (typeof source[0] === 'undefined') {
08270                     source = stringToArray(code);
08271                 }
08272             }
08273         }
08274 
08275         patch();
08276         try {
08277             program = parseProgram();
08278             if (typeof extra.comments !== 'undefined') {
08279                 filterCommentLocation();
08280                 program.comments = extra.comments;
08281             }
08282             if (typeof extra.tokens !== 'undefined') {
08283                 filterTokenLocation();
08284                 program.tokens = extra.tokens;
08285             }
08286             if (typeof extra.errors !== 'undefined') {
08287                 program.errors = extra.errors;
08288             }
08289             if (extra.range || extra.loc) {
08290                 program.body = filterGroup(program.body);
08291             }
08292         } catch (e) {
08293             throw e;
08294         } finally {
08295             unpatch();
08296             extra = {};
08297         }
08298 
08299         return program;
08300     }
08301 
08302     // Sync with package.json.
08303     exports.version = '1.0.3';
08304 
08305     exports.parse = parse;
08306 
08307     // Deep copy.
08308     exports.Syntax = (function () {
08309         var name, types = {};
08310 
08311         if (typeof Object.create === 'function') {
08312             types = Object.create(null);
08313         }
08314 
08315         for (name in Syntax) {
08316             if (Syntax.hasOwnProperty(name)) {
08317                 types[name] = Syntax[name];
08318             }
08319         }
08320 
08321         if (typeof Object.freeze === 'function') {
08322             Object.freeze(types);
08323         }
08324 
08325         return types;
08326     }());
08327 
08328 }));
08329 /* vim: set sw=4 ts=4 et tw=80 : */
08336 /*global define, Reflect */
08337 
08338 /*
08339  * xpcshell has a smaller stack on linux and windows (1MB vs 9MB on mac),
08340  * and the recursive nature of esprima can cause it to overflow pretty
08341  * quickly. So favor it built in Reflect parser:
08342  * https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/SpiderMonkey/Parser_API
08343  */
08344 define('esprimaAdapter', ['./esprima', 'env'], function (esprima, env) {
08345     if (env.get() === 'xpconnect' && typeof Reflect !== 'undefined') {
08346         return Reflect;
08347     } else {
08348         return esprima;
08349     }
08350 });
08351 define('uglifyjs/consolidator', ["require", "exports", "module", "./parse-js", "./process"], function(require, exports, module) {
08427 /*global console:false, exports:true, module:false, require:false */
08428 /*jshint sub:true */
08438 // TODO(user) Consolidation of mathematical values found in numeric literals.
08439 // TODO(user) Unconsolidation.
08440 // TODO(user) Consolidation of ECMA-262 6th Edition programs.
08441 // TODO(user) Rewrite in ECMA-262 6th Edition.
08442 exports['ast_consolidate'] = function(oAbstractSyntaxTree) {
08443   'use strict';
08444   /*jshint bitwise:true, curly:true, eqeqeq:true, forin:true, immed:true,
08445         latedef:true, newcap:true, noarge:true, noempty:true, nonew:true,
08446         onevar:true, plusplus:true, regexp:true, undef:true, strict:true,
08447         sub:false, trailing:true */
08448 
08449   var _,
08455       TSourceElementsData = function() {
08461         this.nCategory = ESourceElementCategories.N_OTHER;
08467         this.aCount = [];
08468         this.aCount[EPrimaryExpressionCategories.N_IDENTIFIER_NAMES] = {};
08469         this.aCount[EPrimaryExpressionCategories.N_STRING_LITERALS] = {};
08470         this.aCount[EPrimaryExpressionCategories.N_NULL_AND_BOOLEAN_LITERALS] =
08471             {};
08476         this.aIdentifiers = [];
08482         this.aPrimitiveValues = [];
08483       },
08490       TPrimitiveValue = function() {
08497         this.nSaving = 0;
08503         this.sName = '';
08504       },
08511       TSolution = function() {
08519         this.oPrimitiveValues = {};
08527         this.nSavings = 0;
08528       },
08535       oProcessor = ( require('./process')),
08543       oWeights = {
08551         N_PROPERTY_ACCESSOR: 1,
08559         N_VARIABLE_DECLARATION: 2,
08567         N_VARIABLE_STATEMENT_AFFIXATION: 4,
08576         N_CLOSURE: 17
08577       },
08584       EPrimaryExpressionCategories = {
08589         N_IDENTIFIER_NAMES: 0,
08594         N_STRING_LITERALS: 1,
08599         N_NULL_AND_BOOLEAN_LITERALS: 2
08600       },
08611       EValuePrefixes = {
08616         S_STRING: '#S',
08621         S_SYMBOLIC: '#O'
08622       },
08629       ESourceElementCategories = {
08635         N_WITH: 0,
08641         N_EVAL: 1,
08647         N_EXCLUDABLE: 2,
08652         N_OTHER: 3
08653       },
08660       A_OTHER_SUBSTITUTABLE_LITERALS = [
08661         'null',   // The null literal.
08662         'false',  // The Boolean literal {@code false}.
08663         'true'    // The Boolean literal {@code true}.
08664       ];
08665 
08666   (
08673    function fExamineSyntacticCodeUnit(oSyntacticCodeUnit) {
08674      var _,
08679          bIsGlobal = 'toplevel' === oSyntacticCodeUnit[0],
08684          bIsWhollyExaminable = !bIsGlobal,
08690          oSourceElements,
08696          oSourceElementData,
08701          oScope,
08707          oWalker,
08714          oWalkers = {
08721            oSurveySourceElement: {  // JsDoc Toolkit 2.4.0 hides some of the keys.
08732              'defun': function(
08733                  sIdentifier,
08734                  aFormalParameterList,
08735                  oFunctionBody) {
08736                fClassifyAsExcludable();
08737                fAddIdentifier(sIdentifier);
08738                aFormalParameterList.forEach(fAddIdentifier);
08739              },
08752              'dot': function(oExpression, sIdentifierName) {
08753                fCountPrimaryExpression(
08754                    EPrimaryExpressionCategories.N_IDENTIFIER_NAMES,
08755                    EValuePrefixes.S_STRING + sIdentifierName);
08756                return ['dot', oWalker.walk(oExpression), sIdentifierName];
08757              },
08766              'function': function(
08767                  sIdentifier,
08768                  aFormalParameterList,
08769                  oFunctionBody) {
08770                if ('string' === typeof sIdentifier) {
08771                  fAddIdentifier(sIdentifier);
08772                }
08773                aFormalParameterList.forEach(fAddIdentifier);
08774              },
08781              'name': function(sIdentifier) {
08782                if (-1 !== A_OTHER_SUBSTITUTABLE_LITERALS.indexOf(sIdentifier)) {
08783                  fCountPrimaryExpression(
08784                      EPrimaryExpressionCategories.N_NULL_AND_BOOLEAN_LITERALS,
08785                      EValuePrefixes.S_SYMBOLIC + sIdentifier);
08786                } else {
08787                  if ('eval' === sIdentifier) {
08788                    oSourceElementData.nCategory =
08789                        ESourceElementCategories.N_EVAL;
08790                  }
08791                  fAddIdentifier(sIdentifier);
08792                }
08793              },
08801              'return': function(oExpression) {
08802                fClassifyAsExcludable();
08803              },
08810              'string': function(sStringValue) {
08811                if (sStringValue.length > 0) {
08812                  fCountPrimaryExpression(
08813                      EPrimaryExpressionCategories.N_STRING_LITERALS,
08814                      EValuePrefixes.S_STRING + sStringValue);
08815                }
08816              },
08827              'try': function(oTry, aCatch, oFinally) {
08828                if (Array.isArray(aCatch)) {
08829                  fAddIdentifier(aCatch[0]);
08830                }
08831              },
08840              'var': function(aVariableDeclarationList) {
08841                fClassifyAsExcludable();
08842                aVariableDeclarationList.forEach(fAddVariable);
08843              },
08856              'with': function(oExpression, oStatement) {
08857                oSourceElementData.nCategory = ESourceElementCategories.N_WITH;
08858                return [];
08859              }  // JsDoc Toolkit 2.4.0 hides some of the keys.
08861            },
08867            oExamineFunctions: {  // JsDoc Toolkit 2.4.0 hides some of the keys.
08877              'defun': function() {
08878                fExamineSyntacticCodeUnit(this);
08879                return [];
08880              },
08889              'function': function() {
08890                fExamineSyntacticCodeUnit(this);
08891                return [];
08892              }  // JsDoc Toolkit 2.4.0 hides some of the keys.
08894            }
08895          },
08900          aSourceElementsData = [],
08907          nAfterDirectivePrologue = 0,
08913          nPosition,
08920          nTo,
08930          cContext = function(oWalker, oSourceElement) {
08935            var fLambda = function() {
08936              return oWalker.walk(oSourceElement);
08937            };
08938 
08939            return fLambda;
08940          },
08946          fClassifyAsExcludable = function() {
08947            if (oSourceElementData.nCategory ===
08948                ESourceElementCategories.N_OTHER) {
08949              oSourceElementData.nCategory =
08950                  ESourceElementCategories.N_EXCLUDABLE;
08951            }
